mapper.select: select no, category_no as categoryNo, title, content, reg_date as regDate from post where #{categoryNo} = category_no order by reg_date desc;
select no, category_no as categoryNo, title, content, reg_date as regDate from post where #{categoryNo} = category_no order by reg_date desc limit 1;

select no, category_no as categoryNo, title, content, reg_date as regDate from post where category_no = ( select c.no from category c, blog b where #{id} = b.user_id and b.no = c.blog_no order by c.no desc limit 1) order by reg_date desc limit 1;
select no, category_no as categoryNo, title, content, reg_date as regDate from post where #{postNo} = no;
